product.title: μCT 45 Benchtop microCT Scanner
product.summary: μCT45/90 is SCANCO Medical’s upgrade to μCT35/40/80, offering a smaller footprint while combining high resolution (1.25 μm / 2.2 μm) with a larger sample chamber. An auto-sampler (20/16 positions) enables batch and unattended scanning. Typical use covers ex vivo specimens (bone, teeth, tissue, materials) and various materials for internal structural and mechanical analysis; contrast-enhanced animal imaging can visualize cardiovascular, urinary, and digestive systems. Widely used across orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, regenerative medicine, cardiovascular studies, materials science, geology, and paleontology.

type.label: Type
lines: Fully shielded, no external shielding required

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; 5 µm focal spot (4/8 W); 20–90 kVp (with preset/calibrated 45/55/70/90 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 5 µm (10% MTF); 1.25–100 µm nominal isotropic voxel size

options.label: Auto-sampler
options.value: Up to 20 sample positions (depending on max sample size)
